column4: anyone used quicksynergy and had a issue with it? aka thinking shift,ctrl and alt are all pressed all the time when you move mouse from screen to screen?
ive heard of a syngery bug where the meta keys like that can get stuck. but never seen it happen to me.
not heard of any fixes at all have you? ^^
dident really look into it.  last i read about it was a few months back. or perhaps a year ago
